sentences.en: A kind of new typed robotic abrasive belt grinder was designed.

sentences.en: A robotic sheep mowed lawns, and robotic flags raised and lowered automatically.

sentences.en: Astronaut Pierre Thuot tried to latch the 15-foot robotic arm onto the satellite.

sentences.en: Robotic system for surgery is a kind of computer - integrated surgery ( CIS ) system.

sentences.en: The age of the robotic rodent is upon us.

sentences.en: There is something a little robotic about him.
They ues the milked the corpse robotic systems to milk their cows.

sentences.en: This factory floor is a showcase for automation and robotic equipment.

sentences.en: Today's robotic work cells are increasingly becoming more complex.

sentences.en: We took these pictures from a deep diving robotic submarine.

sentences.en: While near the volcano the robotic submarine also collected fluid samples.
sentences.cn: 正是在靠近该火山的地方,水下机器人也收集到了该火山的流体样品.
